instruction: Brainstorm new uses for a paperclip
output:
- Secure papers or cards in a folder 
- Create a hook to hang items on a wall 
- Use as a makeshift zipper pull
- Use as a makeshift screwdriver 
- Connect two hangers together
- Connect small sticks to create an art sculpture 
- Mark a page in a book or magazine
- Repair torn clothing with a makeshift button 
- Use as a bookmark 
- Create a makeshift keychain
- Use as a cable managment system 
- Use as a makeshift phone stand 
- Create a makeshift phone holder
